name: Heart&Slash
blurb: Heart, a malfunctioning robot, fights for its identity against the minions of standardization. A 3D brawler/roguelike for PC/Mac/Linux

rewards.reward: "WE HEART YOU" Tier:\r\n\r\nThank you for supporting Heart&Slash. Your name will appear in the credits of the game as a token of gratitude.
"JUST THE GAME" Tier: Get a DRM-free digital copy of Heart&Slash (or a Steam key if we get Greenlit) when the game is released.  + All the cumulative rewards from the "WE HEART YOU" tier.
"I LIKE WHAT I HEAR" Tier: Get a DRM-free digital copy of Heart&Slash's soundtrack, by Michael Chait. + All the cumulative rewards from the "JUST THE GAME" tier and above.

"TWO HEARTS, FOUR EARS" Tier: February 14th special! Enjoy Heart&Slash with the person you feel closest to! Get TWO DRM-free digital copies of Heart&Slash's soundtrack, by Michael Chait and TWO DRM-free digital copies of Heart&Slash. THIS TIER IS LIMITED, AND THUS NOT INCLUDED IN OTHER TIERS!
"CRASH DUMMY" Tier: Get access to the early beta of the game and to the developers' forum. Help us polish the experience! + All the cumulative rewards from the "I LIKE WHAT I HEAR" tier and above.
"SVGA" Tier: Get a downloadable digital art book showing Heart&Slash's creation process!  + All the cumulative rewards from the "CRASH DUMMY" tier and above.
"I NEED A GPS" Tier: Get a digital strategy guide of the game to help you avoid ridicule while playing Heart&Slash! + All the cumulative rewards from the "SVGA" tier and above.

"IT'S PERSONAL NOW" Tier: Get an unique, personalized, digital copy of the game. The game will have some special (and unique to your copy) text intro thanking you for your support. Some in-game text will also be personalized (but to what end it's a secret). The experience of the game (systems and content) will be otherwise the same as the standard copies.  + All the cumulative rewards from the "I NEED A GPS" tier and above.

"COLLABORATOR" Tier: Design your own weapon to be produced by us and included in Heart&Slash, including sound and visuals. We'll work with you to make sure it fits both your and our standards (and ours are lax), but we keep the right to reject inadequate proposals if a compromise can\u00b4t be reached + All the cumulative rewards from the "I NEED A GPS" tier and above.

"DESIGNER" Tier: Design your own enemy to be produced by us and included in Heart&Slash, including sound, visuals and their weapons. The enemies must be robotic. We'll work with you to make sure it fits into the game, but we keep the right to reject inadequate proposals if a compromise can\u00b4t be reached + All the cumulative rewards from the "I NEED A GPS" tier and above.

"CREATOR" Tier: Design your own UNLOCKABLE PLAYABLE CHARACTER to be produced by us and included in Heart&Slash, including sound, visuals and its movement. The character must be a robot. We'll work with you to make sure it fits into the game, but we keep the right to reject inadequate proposals if a compromise can\u00b4t be reached + All the cumulative rewards from the "IT'S PERSONAL NOW" tier and above.

"ENTREPENEUR" Tier: You get a link to a 3D-printing-ready *exclusive* model of one of the game\u00b4s character. The file is yours to do with as you please, including the rights to sell or otherwise distribute the 3D-printed models. You are not allowed to make derivative works, though. + All the cumulative rewards from the "IT'S PERSONAL NOW" tier and above.

"CREATIVE DIRECTOR" Tier: Collaborate with us in the design of a room set (a series of rooms in a level with specific variations, behavior and even unique mechanics. You start with a theme or a sketch and we'll show you our take on it and implement your feedback until you are satisfied + All the cumulative rewards from the "IT'S PERSONAL NOW" tier and above.

"QUASSY'S MINIONS"

Your very own personal Game Jam! You will own our creative minds  during 48 hours. The whole team will be working around the clock to make the game you desire. Whether you want your own personal story with the characters of the game or a totally different experience we will do our very best to deliver.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
 + All the cumulative rewards from the "IT'S PERSONAL NOW" tier and above.

"PATRON" Tier: Wow, this is a lot of money. For starters, you are getting all of aheartfulofgames games, forever (and if Heart&Slash is successful we plan to do many more). Moreover, you will appear as a character in all of our games (Heart&Slash included). The character will have a name and a personality trait of your choice that will be consistent over all our games (and we are open to discuss visual appearance too, of course). + All the cumulative rewards from the "I NEED A GPS" tier and above.
